detail_desc: Fitted, V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a narrow rib-trim around the neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.
Short, fitted T-shirt in soft fabric with a round neckline.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and gathered frills at the top. The polyester content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail. The polyester content of the scrunchie is partly recycled.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable strap and metal fastener at the back.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a polo neck, twisted side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.

Backpack in a patterned weave with a two-way zip and handle at the top. Adjustable, lightly padded shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment with a padded, imitation leather pendant. Size approx. 13x25x32 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband. The polyester content of the tights is partly recycled.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with a hood with decorative ears at the top. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Lined.
Ankle boots with pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a sheen, with a high-cut V-neck and sewn in wrapover at the top. Asymmetric front with gathers and draping. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a slightly wider neckline.
Batik-patterned jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Dress in soft velour with a glittery pattern. Short butterfly sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
T-shirt in airy linen jersey. Relaxed fit with a V-neck.
Shirt in soft washed denim with a collar, contrasting-colour press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button and seams on the shoulders and back. Rounded hem.
V-neck cardigan in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length dress in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature, a hood and long sleeves. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. Low neckline at the back with a grosgrain ribbon.
Soft handbag in imitation leather with two handles, a zip and a detachable shoulder strap at the top, and three inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 27x31 cm.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Sleeveless dress in slub cotton jersey with woven broderie anglaise flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with asymmetric cut-outs at the hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Fine-knit jumper in cotton slub yarn with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Padded bomber jacket with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric and a ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front, side pockets with a press-stud and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Wide, short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with embroidered text on the front.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a high, adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit jumper in a soft silk and cotton blend with long raglan sleeves with buttons at the top, and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a rib-knit wool blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front, and side pockets. Lined.

Utility shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, gathers at the shoulders and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, a yoke with gathers at the back, buttons at the cuffs and a rounded hem.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.

Blouse in frill-trimmed, crinkled jersey with a small, smocked stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and circular peplum.

Set with a top and pair of joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Top with a flounce-trimmed yoke, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Dress in patterned sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a gently rounded hem and a detachable, braided imitation leather belt. Unlined.
Scarf in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbed trims on the short sides. Length 180 cm. Width 40 cm.

Maxi dress in soft jersey with a V-neck at the front and low-cut neckline at the back. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and a long, pleated, heavily draping skirt. Lined.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Thin metal rings in various designs, nine decorated with small plastic stones.
Opaque matt leggings with an elasticated waist. 200 denier.

Jacket in soft fleece made partly from recycled polyester designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.

Jacket in soft, supple imitation suede with a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud, discreet side pockets and press-studs at the cuffs. Adjustable tab with press-studs at the sides.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a square neckline front and back and an integral sports bra with a double-layered front and elasticated hem.
Pull-on jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated drawstring waist. Fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket, and elasticated hems.
Dressing gown in soft jersey made from a cotton and viscose blend with satin trims, long sleeves, a detachable satin tie belt and front pockets.
Fitted top in a soft rib knit with a square neckline and long sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short dress in cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with an all-over print, round neckline and an elasticated drawstring at the hem.
Short, straight-cut nightdress in soft jersey.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly, spacious side pockets, welt back pockets and a discreet coin pocket.
Skirt in an airy cotton weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, frill trim at the top, sewn-on tie belt and side pockets. Unlined.
Fully lined print-patterned bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps.
Print-patterned wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Linings and insoles in jersey made from recycled polyester, and fluted soles.
Rectangular sunglasses with plastic and metal frames, thin sidepieces, adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Soft, non-wired push-up bra in ribbed microfibre with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hem and no fasteners. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Cap in cotton twill with an appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Wide blouse in an airy cotton and viscose blend with a round neckline and gathers at the top for added width and a soft draping effect. Visible buttons down the back, wide raglan balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with embroidered appliqués on the front. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.

Knee-length dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a slightly wider neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Chokers in fabric with a metal fastener at the back. Adjustable length, 30-38 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the front and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and tapered legs with creases both front and back.
